title: i hate you here
body:
Dear Rito,
After posting about a miserable match where you found it fair to pin my team and i against plats and golds where we were bronze and silver. You're match making is awful and if it weren't for the extreme amount of money i dropped on skins i would uninstall your awful game. If it weren't for the fact that every now and then i have fun i'd quit! try to get to gold get trolled out you support a troll community and elitist jerks. you Promote the hate in this game by you own match making. Seriously? its stupid, balance your own game jesus. and you deleted my last post to hide negative feed back so again i hate you.

replies.body: We need more thugs like you!
then why base everything off rank and not mmr on profile? why have 2 classifications

*-facepalm-*

Division has nothing to do with player skill. MMR does.
Team mmr has nothing to do with player mmr?
